description:
Dracomino is a falling block puzzle game where you place falling shapes to pick up coins on the board
or arrange into rows to clear them and find items.

v0.2.1.description:
# Version 0.2.1
*Compatible with game version 0.2.0 and up*
 - Overhaul code that decides where coins go. Very small goals (even as low as 1 line) can generate now.
 - Add Line Clear Leniency option (default 2)
 - Max Stacking Height option starts at 1
 - Set default Max Stacking Height to 15
 - Add Early Second Drop option (default true)
 - Add Early Rotate option (default false)
 - Set minimum Starting Shapes options to 3. This creates enough of a minimum early sphere for early items.
 - Add Ability Whitelist option, to customize which abilities show up
 - Rotate Clockwise/Counterclockwise is reclassified as progression+useful
 - Gravity is reclassified as useful+trap
 - Added item groups "Piece", "Dracomino", "Polyomino", and "Mino" as equivalents to "Shape" group
 - Add OptionError for "too little location space" if not enough room for locations
v0.2.1.title: Dracomino APWorld Version 0.2.1
